name: Split
overview: Import feature flags from Split to LaunchDarkly.
description: Import feature flags from Split to LaunchDarkly. Customize a tag to be assigned to each flag imported.
author: LaunchDarkly

formVariables.name: Split API Key
formVariables.description: An API key with read permissions on your Split workspace

formVariables.name: Split Workspace ID
formVariables.description: The ID of the Split Workspace to import from

formVariables.name: Split Environment ID
formVariables.description: The ID of the Split environment to import from

formVariables.name: Split Tag
formVariables.description: Provide a tag to only import a subset of your flags from split based on the tag. Leave blank to import all flags.

formVariables.name: LaunchDarkly Tag
formVariables.description: A tag to apply to all flags imported from Split. Defaults to 'imported-from-split'
